name: Sorsapuisto
description: A spacious duck park offering serene walking paths around a tranquil pond, surrounded by lush greenery perfect for a quiet family afternoon.

name: Osmonpuisto Playground
description: A leafy playground nestled within a quiet green oasis, where families can enjoy gentle swings, picnic benches, and safe open spaces for children to explore.

name: Cafe Kaisuli
description: A charming cafe set amid verdant surroundings, offering home‑baked delights and a cozy patio where families can savor quiet moments over warm drinks.

name: Café Tammela
description: A family-friendly cafe tucked beside a green courtyard, serving local comfort food in a tranquil setting ideal for quiet gatherings.

name: Tammelantori Stop
description: A quiet bus stop shaded by mature trees, offering a green respite for families commuting in a calm neighborhood setting.

name: Kirjasto Stop
description: A serene bus stop adjacent to a leafy library park, providing families a peaceful waiting spot amidst gentle greenery.

name: Aimo Park Tammelan stadion
description: A well‑maintained parking facility surrounded by leafy avenues, offering families easy access and a quiet, secure place for vehicles.

name: Kauppakeskus Duo Hall
description: A spacious parking hall nestled beneath a green boulevard, providing families a secure and quiet spot to park before leisure strolls.

name: Tammelantori Square
description: A bustling market square lined with seasonal stalls, set against a backdrop of green trees where families can browse in a relaxed, quiet atmosphere.

name: Metso Main Library
description: A grand library enveloped by leafy parkland, offering families a quiet green retreat to explore books and share peaceful reading time.
